user_assist.summary: Follow-up session addressing severe worsening of depressive symptoms, including vegetative signs and passive suicidal ideation, leading to an adjustment of the current Sertraline regimen.
user_assist.reasoning: This is a routine psychiatric follow-up reviewing treatment response. The discussion involves significant depressive episode markers (anhedonia, sleep disturbance, guilt), a detailed safety assessment (passive SI ruled out as active plan), and the titration of an SSRI (Sertraline). All content is valid clinical history and treatment planning.
